meanings.definition: To get into one's hands or possession
meanings.sent1: The child takes the candy from the jar.
meanings.sent2: I take the book from the shelf to read.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel takes the nut and scurries up the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her smile takes my worries and makes them disappear.
meanings.sent5: The wind takes the leaves and dances with them.
